DOC.brief_summary: One centre follow-up study on safety and efficacy of treatment with rituximab among patients with RA during 4 year period. Basic data is collected for the national register of biologicals.
DOC.brief_title: Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA) Treated With Rituximab in Kuopio University Hospital
DOC.detailed_description: Data is collected on regular visits in the outpatient department. In collection national register forms have been used.
DOC.criteria: active RA without response to earlier treatment contraindications to rituximab
